org.jdrupes.httpcodec.types

Class Converters

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jdrupes.httpcodec.types.Converters

  • public final class Converters
extends Object

    Utility methods and singletons for converters.

      • UNQUOTED_STRING

        public static final Converter<String> UNQUOTED_STRING

        A noop converter, except that text is trimmed when converted to a value.

      • UNQUOTE_ONLY

        public static final Converter<String> UNQUOTE_ONLY

        A noop converter, except that text is trimmed and unquoted when converted to a value.

      • LANGUAGE

        public static final Converter<Locale> LANGUAGE

        A converter for a language or language range. Language range “*” is converted to a Locale with an empty language.

      • LANGUAGE_LIST

        public static final MultiValueConverter<List<ParameterizedValue<Locale>>,ParameterizedValue<Locale>> LANGUAGE_LIST

        A converter for a weighted list of languages.

        public static final org.jdrupes.httpcodec.types.Converters.ProductDescriptionConverter PRODUCT_DESCRIPTIONS

        A converter for product descriptions as used in the User-Agent and Server header fields.

      • WILDCARD

        public static final String WILDCARD

        Used by the Etag.EtagConverter to unambiguously denote a decoded wildcard. If the result of fromFieldValue == WILDCARD, the field value was an unquoted asterisk. If the result equals("*"), it may also have been a quoted asterisk.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ETAG

        public static final Etag.EtagConverter ETAG

        A converter for an ETag header.

      • ETAG_LIST

        public static final Converter<List<Etag>> ETAG_LIST

      • CHALLENGE_LIST

        public static final Converter<List<ParameterizedValue<String>>> CHALLENGE_LIST

        A converter for a list of challenges.

        public static final Converter<ParameterizedValue<String>> CREDENTIALS

      • unquote

        public static String unquote(String value)

        If the string contains a char with a backslash before it, remove the backslash.

        Parameters:
        value - the value to unquote
        Returns:
        the unquoted value
        Throws:
        ParseException - if the input violates the field format
        See Also:
        Field value components

      • unquoteString

        public static String unquoteString(String value)
                            throws ParseException

        If the value is double quoted, remove the quotes and escape characters.

        Parameters:
        value - the value to unquote
        Returns:
        the unquoted value
        Throws:
        ParseException - if the input violates the field format

        Field value components

        public static int tokenLength(String text,
                              int startPos)

        Determines the length of a token in a header field

        Parameters:

        startPos - the start position
        Returns:
        the length of the token
        See Also:
        RFC 7230, Section 3.2.6

        startPos - the start position
        Returns:
        the length of the token
        See Also:
        RFC 7235, Section 2.1

      • whiteSpaceLength

        public static int whiteSpaceLength(String text,
                                   int startPos)

        Determines the length of a white space sequence in a header field.

        Parameters:
        text - the test to parse
        startPos - the start position
        Returns:
        the length of the white space sequence
        See Also:
        RFC 7230, Section 3.2.3

      • commentLength

        public static int commentLength(String text,
                                int startPos)

        Determines the length of a comment in a header field.

        Parameters:
        text - the text to parse
        startPos - the starting position (must be the position of the opening brace)
        Returns:
        the length of the comment
        See Also:
        RFC 7230, Section 3.2.6

        Parameters:
        text - the text
        startPos - the start position
        matches - the chars to match
        Returns:
        the length
